title: Discord-Based University Computer Graphics Peer Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic 3D modeling, experience with graphic software (Blender/Maya), foundational linear algebra concepts
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative environment using mobile devices, with an immediate peer feedback system operational after project completion.

learning_goals: Learners must engage in technical discussions with peers via Discord channels at least three times weekly to resolve over 80% of project issues
Learners exchange three or more rounds of specific feedback (technical/aesthetic) through peer evaluation
Learners achieve a 25% improvement in project completion by utilizing a senior-junior mentoring system
Learners perform knowledge dissemination activities by sharing micro-content (5-minute videos/images) five or more times weekly in mobile environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
